sourcesContent: import { Component, ElementRef } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inicio', templateUrl: './inicio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inicio.component.css'] }) export class InicioComponent { constructor(private elementRef: ElementRef) {} ngAfterViewInit() { const video = this.elementRef.nativeElement.querySelector('#background-video'); video.style.position = 'fixed'; video.style.top = '0'; video.style.left = '0'; video.style.width = '100%'; video.style.height = '100%'; video.playbackRate = 1; } }
